Title: Relates to prohibiting the New York city board of elections from entering into contracts for certain services related to the conduct of elections with any entity that does not employ union labor
Summary: Relates to prohibiting New York city boards of elections from entering into contracts for certain services related to the conduct of elections with any entity that does not employ union labor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to prohibiting New York city boards of elections from entering into certain contracts with entities that do not employ union labor
